scripts.cy:run:1: npx cypress run --config-file cypress-prod.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/santa-1.cy.js --browser chrome --record --key dfd323b2-baf8-4830-827c-a313a25ae33b
scripts.cy:run:2: npx cypress run --config-file cypress-prod.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/santa-2.cy.js --browser electron --record --key dfd323b2-baf8-4830-827c-a313a25ae33b
scripts.cy:run:all: npm run cy:run:1 && npm run cy:run:2
scripts.cy:run:all:dashboard: npm run cy:run:1 && npm run cy:run:2
